SUMMARY: Lekarna.cz offers home delivery, parcel shop/locker pickup, and in-store pickup in Chrudim. Delivery partners include PPL, Zásilkovna, and Česká pošta (Balíkovna). Shipping costs are tiered based on the order value, starting from 49 Kč for pickup points and 79 Kč for home delivery. Free shipping is available for all orders over 1500 Kč. The minimum order value is 250 Kč. Cash on delivery is available for a 39 Kč surcharge with Zásilkovna and Česká pošta. NOTABLE FEATURES: The pricing structure is clearly laid out in tiers depending on the total value of the shopping cart. A wide network of pickup points and lockers is available through major national carriers. The store also offers personal pickup at their pharmacy in Chrudim. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is excellent. It is located on a dedicated 'Doprava a platba' page, which is easy to find. The use of tables to display the tiered pricing structure is very clear and helps customers easily understand the costs associated with their order size. Detailed descriptions of each delivery method are also provided.
